ProjectTitle: Metabolic Profiling of bioactive Antimicrobial Metabolites from Some of the selected Tanzanian Medicinal Plants: Bio-guided fractionation and Untargeted Metabolomics approaches.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
04/11/2024
Storage: you now mention multiple locations including personal devices and hard drives which are not very secure, please have a look at the storage guide to see if other solutions may be easier, you can consider using the large volume storage servers for LC-MS data for example (https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en)
label: good with suggestions
